resources.string: Welcome to the Sweet Home portal, please complete the fields below to proceed with your registration:
Use at least eight characters with a combination of letters, numbers, and symbols.
I have read and accept the terms and privacy policies.
Accompaniment, advice and economic support for family strengthening.

The Sweet Home is a modality of restoration of rights that consists of accompaniment, advice and economic support for family strengthening, this measure applies to families that have the conditions for the care, affection and attention of children under 18 years of age with disabilities.

This type of care offers beneficiary families tools to improve the care of their children with disabilities, in their housing conditions, as well as enhances their management capacity for the use of institutional, social and community service networks, which facilitate the exercise of their rights.
